Context:
The George Brown College has Public Safety and Security teams stationed at various locations 24/7, including St. James (200 King St. E., upper main lobby security booth, 230 Richmond St. E., Room 154, and 341 King St. E., Room 103), Casa Loma (146 Kendal Ave.), Waterfront (51 Dockside Dr. and 3 Lower Jarvis), and The George Residence (80 Cooperage Street). Security guards are trained in Emergency First Aid and CPR, and receive regular scenario training.

Non-emergency emails can be sent to gbccrimestoppers@georgebrown.ca, and emergencies can be reported via the emergency line (416-415-4000 or 0 from an internal GBC Cisco phone) or emergency text number (416-723-4761). Individual campus security contacts are as follows: St. James Security (ext. 2773), Casa Loma Security (ext. 4010), Waterfront Security (ext. 2773), and TMU Security (ext. 5040).
